numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The author asks whether sports is the biggest thing for colored people.
2. The author notices that basketball has the highest percentage of players of color.
3. The author notices that basketball has the highest percentage of coaches of color.
4. The author notices that baseball has the lowest percentage of players of color.
5. The author notices that football has the lowest percentage of coaches of color.
6. Football has many players of color.
7. The author wonders why football has the lowest percentage of coaches of color.
9. This situation impacts the community of the author.
10. The author thinks that this situation shows that sports is popular in the culture of colored people.
